Apollo.name: Barricade Kit
Apollo.description: A deployable cover that can block incoming damage until it breaks.

Apollo.name: Blue Light Stick
Apollo.description: A throwable chemical light that illuminates the area around it.

Apollo.name: Deadline
Apollo.description: A mine that deals damage to anything within its radius once the timer runs out

Apollo.name: Door Blocker
Apollo.description: A locking mechanism that can be placed on large metal doors to limit access.

Apollo.name: Gas Mine
Apollo.description: A proximity-triggered mine that pops up and deploys a gas cloud that rapidly drains stamina

Apollo.name: Green Light Stick
Apollo.description: A throwable chemical light that illuminates the area around it.

Apollo.name: Heavy Fuze Grenade
Apollo.description: A grenade that detonates after a delay, dealing explosive damage in its radius.

Apollo.name: Jolt Mine
Apollo.description: A proximity triggered mine that pops up and stuns anything within its radius.

Apollo.name: Light Impact Grenade
Apollo.description: A grenade that detonates on impact, dealing explosive damage in a small radius.

Apollo.name: Noisemaker
Apollo.description: A deployable proximity sensor that sounds an alarm when enemy raiders are detected.

Apollo.name: Pulse Mine
Apollo.description: A proximity-triggered mine that pops up and knocks back anything within its radius

Apollo.name: Recorder
Apollo.description: A playable recorder used to attract ARC's attention and impress other Raiders.

Apollo.name: Red Light Stick
Apollo.description: A throwable chemical light that illuminates the area around it.

Apollo.name: Remote Raider Flare
Apollo.description: A deployable device that, when manually triggered, launches a Raider Distress Flare.

Apollo.name: Seeker Grenade
Apollo.description: A homing grenade that targets a single nearby ARC dealing explosive damage on impact

Apollo.name: Smoke Grenade
Apollo.description: A grenade that creates a lingering smoke cloud on impact, blocking visibility from other Raiders.

Apollo.name: Snap Blast Grenade
Apollo.description: A grenade that sticks to surfaces, dealing explosive damage after a short delay.

Apollo.name: Trailblazer Grenade
Apollo.description: A grenade that emits a trail of flammable gas along its path, causing an explosive chain reaction when it ignites.

Apollo.name: Yellow Light Stick
Apollo.description: A throwable chemical light that illuminates the area around it.

Apollo.name: Zipline
Apollo.description: A deployable zipline that allows you to quickly move between two locations.

Celeste.name: Battery
Celeste.description: Used to craft medical supplies. Can be recycled into scrap metal.

Celeste.name: Canister
Celeste.description: Used to craft a wide range of items. Can be recycled into plastic.

Celeste.name: Chemicals
Celeste.description: Used to craft medical supplies, explosives, and utility items.

Celeste.name: Complex Gun Parts
Celeste.description: Used to craft advanced weapons.

Celeste.name: Duct Tape
Celeste.description: Used to craft a wide range of items. Can be recycled into crafting materials

Celeste.name: Exodus Modules
Celeste.description: Used to craft a wide range of items.

Celeste.name: Fabric
Celeste.description: Used to craft medical supplies and shields.

Celeste.name: Great Mullein
Celeste.description: Used to craft medical supplies.

Celeste.name: Heavy Gun Parts
Celeste.description: Used directly in crafting items of all tiers.

Celeste.name: Light Gun Parts
Celeste.description: Assorted spare parts used for pistols and SMGs.

Celeste.name: Magnet
Celeste.description: Fun thing to put on a fridgerator.

Celeste.name: Medium Gun Parts
Celeste.description: Assorted spare parts used for rifles.

Celeste.name: Metal Parts
Celeste.description: Used to craft a wide range of items.

Celeste.name: Moss
Celeste.description: Can be used to regain a small amount of health.

Celeste.name: Oil
Celeste.description: Used to craft weapons and explosives. Can be recycled into chemicals.

Celeste.name: Processor
Celeste.description: Used in crafting.

Celeste.name: Rope
Celeste.description: Used in crafting.

Celeste.name: Rubber Parts
Celeste.description: Used to craft a wide range of items.

Celeste.name: Sensors
Celeste.description: Used to craft utility items and explosives. Can be recycled into scrap metal.

Celeste.name: Simple Gun Parts
Celeste.description: Used to craft weapons. Can be recycled into scrap metal.

Celeste.name: Speaker Component
Celeste.description: Used in crafting.

Celeste.name: Steel Spring
Celeste.description: A tightly wound coil of metal. Used to craft a wide range of items. Can be recycled into scrap metal.

Celeste.name: Synthesized Fuel
Celeste.description: Used to craft utility items and explosives. Can be recycled into chemicals.

Celeste.name: Syringe
Celeste.description: A sterile syringe for medical use. Used to craft medical supplies. Can be recycled into plastic.

Celeste.name: Voltage Converter
Celeste.description: A device that adjusts electrical voltage for various crafting purposes.

Celeste.name: Wires
Celeste.description: A bundle of old wires. Used to craft a wide range of items. Can be recycled into scrap metal.

Lance.name: Adrenaline Shot
Lance.description: A serum that fully restores stamina and temporarily increases stamina regeneration

Lance.name: Bandage
Lance.description: A medical item that gradually restores health over time.

Lance.name: Combat Mk. 1
Lance.description: Basic combat augment. Supports stronger shields, but with limited backpack capacity and Quick Use slots.

Lance.name: Combat Mk. 2
Lance.description: A Combat augment is more focused on maneuverability than absorbing damage.

Lance.name: Defibrillator
Lance.description: An injection that quickly revives downed raiders and restores some health.

Lance.name: Heavy Shield
Lance.description: A heavy shield that blocks a large portion of incoming damage, but carries a significant cost to mobility.

Lance.name: Herbal Bandage
Lance.description: An improvised medical item that gradually restores health over time.

Lance.name: Light Shield
Lance.description: A lightweight shield that offers limited protection without severely impacting mobility.

Lance.name: Looting Mk. 1
Lance.description: Basic looting augment. More backpack slots and weight capacity, but low defensive and tactical capability.

Lance.name: Looting Mk. 2
Lance.description: Significantly increases looting potential; adds slots for trinkets.

Lance.name: Medium Shield
Lance.description: A standard shield that blocks a medium portion of incoming damage at a moderate cost to mobility.

Lance.name: Shield Recharger
Lance.description: A handheld repair kit that recharges a shield on use.

Lance.name: Sterilized Bandage
Lance.description: A medical item that gradually restores a large amount health over time.

Lance.name: Surge Shield Recharger
Lance.description: A handkeld kit that recharges a shield

Lance.name: Tactical Mk. 1
Lance.description: Basic tactical augment. More Quick Use slots for more tactical choice, but limited survivability and slightly lower looting potential.

Lance.name: Tactical Mk. 2
Lance.description: Adds more backpack space and an extra utility item slot.

Shani.name: Acoustic Guitar
Shani.description: A playable acoustic guitar used to attract ARC's attention and impress other Raiders.

Shani.name: Binoculars
Shani.description: A basic pair of binoculars with two levels of magnification.

TianWen.name: Angled Grip I
TianWen.description: Slightly reduces horizontal recoil.

TianWen.name: Angled Grip III
TianWen.description: Significantly reduces horizontal recoil.

TianWen.name: Anvil I
TianWen.description: Single-action hand cannon with high damage output and headshot damage, but slow handling.

TianWen.name: Burletta I
TianWen.description: Semi-automatic pistol with decent damage output and accuracy. Can be fired as fast as you can pull the trigger.

TianWen.name: Compensator I
TianWen.description: Slightly reduces per-shot dispersion.

TianWen.name: Energy Clip
TianWen.description: Ammo used for energy weapons. One clip will fully charge a single weapon.

TianWen.name: Extended Light Mag I
TianWen.description: Slightly extends the ammo capacity of the compatible weapons that use light ammo.

TianWen.name: Extended Light Mag II
TianWen.description: Moderately extends the ammo capacity of the compatible weapons that use light ammo.

TianWen.name: Extended Medium Mag I
TianWen.description: Slightly extends the ammo capacity of compatible weapons that use medium ammo.

TianWen.name: Extended Shotgun Mag I
TianWen.description: Slightly extends the ammo capacity of compatible weapons that use shotgun ammo.

TianWen.name: Ferro I
TianWen.description: Heavy break-action rifle. Packs a punch, but must be reloaded between every shot.

TianWen.name: Hairpin I
TianWen.description: Single-action pistol with a built-in silencer. Great for stealth, but tricky in combat.

TianWen.name: Heavy Ammo
TianWen.description: Heavy bullets used mainly with large-caliber weapons.

TianWen.name: Hullcracker I
TianWen.description: Fires explosive projectiles that only detonate when hitting ARC.

TianWen.name: Il Toro I
TianWen.description: Pump-action shotgun with large bullet spread, sharp falloff, and high damage output.

TianWen.name: Kettle I
TianWen.description: Semi-automatic assault rifle. Quick and accurate, but has low bullet velocity and takes a long time reload.

TianWen.name: Launcher Ammo
TianWen.description: Anti-ARC payloads used mainly by the Hullcracker

TianWen.name: Light Ammo
TianWen.description: Light bullets used mainly with SMGs and light handguns. Such as Kettle, Stitcher, Burletta, Hairpin and Bobcat.

TianWen.name: Medium Ammo
TianWen.description: Medium bullets used mainly with medium-caliber weapons. Such as Rattler, Tempest, Arpeggio, Renegade and Torrente.

TianWen.name: Muzzle Brake I
TianWen.description: Slightly reduces both vertical recoil & horizontal recoil.

TianWen.name: Padded Stock
TianWen.description: Significantly improves stability.

TianWen.name: Renegade I
TianWen.description: Lever-action battle rifle with high damage output, accuracy, and headshot damage.

TianWen.name: Shotgun ammo
TianWen.description: Shotgun shells used for shotguns.

TianWen.name: Shotgun Choke I
TianWen.description: Slightly reduces base dispersion.

TianWen.name: Shotgun Choke II
TianWen.description: Moderately reduces base dispersion.

TianWen.name: Stable Stock I
TianWen.description: Slightly improves dispersion & recoil recovery time. Compatible with: Rattler, Ferro, Arpeggio, Bettina, Kettle.

TianWen.name: Stitcher I
TianWen.description: Full automatic SMG. Deals good damage, but has quite a low fire-rate and can be hard to control.

TianWen.name: Vertical Grip I
TianWen.description: Slightly reduces vertical recoil.
